channel.title: ExtraLabs Software News
channel.description: Founded in 2002, ExtraLabs Software is a dynamically expanding software development company, focused on producing NET software for home and corporate users. We build our success on the talent and experience of our developers and ideas of our clients who inspire and guide our work in bringing to life powerful capabilities and innovative software tools.

item.title: Technical support gets complete reorganization
item.description: Complete reorganization of the technical support service to remove all technically incompetent employees, and make it an more effective. Help desk system also was upgraded.

item.title: ExtraLabs Software unveils Feed Editor 5.5
item.description:
We're happy to announce that a new version of Feed Editor (5.5) is now available for download.

New features include:

- Program interface is improved;
- Completely new unicode and multilingual support;
- Full Windows Vista support;
- RDF/Atom feed support;
- iTunes support is improved;
- Fields autofilling feature;
- SecureFTP for FTP upload;
- New feature-rich image editor;
- xHTML support;
- Built-in HTML editor is improved;
- Built-in XML editor is improved;
- ID3 tags support for podcasting;
- Built-in Feed Validator;
- Ability to export to MS Excel;
- One-click search/replace;
... and many others!

You can download this new version from our site:
http://www.extralabs.net/FeedEditorSetup.exe
item.author: dmitry@extralabs.net

item.title: Skype Recorder v.1.3 released!
item.description:
Skype Recorder is a surprisingly easy-to-use tool for recording Skype audio conversations.

What's new:
Added: Ftp support
Fixed: Bug with output folder
Added: Ogg Vorbis audio codec

item.title: News Screensaver 1.31 Released!
item.description:
New product: News Screensaver.

 

News Screensaver is a screensaver that will allow you to always have the most recent news on the computer screen.

Read more

Download

item.title: New Product: Easy RSS Content Generator!
item.description: Easy RSS Content Generator is an easy-to-use program for creating new unique content out of news feeds (the RSS, Atom, and RDF formats are supported). You can use this product, for instance, to create completely autonomous, automatically updated sites, to increase the amount of content on the topic, and to earn money with Adsense. Easy RSS Content Generator has a built-in FTP client, an automatic word replacement dictionary that will allow you to increase the uniqueness of the created pages, and a built-in tool for prompting keywords. You can use it to quickly search for RSS feeds and add them. No special knowledge is required, it is easy and comfortable to use the program.
